verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> [TshirA Song מִזְמ֑וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor; [or] Psalm הָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> ha-Ri-'u Make a joyful noise לֵ֝אלֹהִים <WH430> Le-lo-him unto God כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. all ye lands

זַמְּר֥וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru Sing forth כְבֽוֹד־ <WH3519> che-Vod- the honour שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo; of his name שִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> Si-mu make כָ֝ב֗וֹד <WH3519> cha-Vod, glorious תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH8416> te-hil-la-To. his praise

אִמְר֣וּ <WH559> 'im-Ru Say לֵ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> Le-lo-him unto God מַה־ <WH4100> mah- How נּוֹרָ֣א <WH3372> no-Ra How terrible מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei-cha; [art thou in] thy works בְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> be-Ro through the greatness עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <WH5797> 'uz-ze-cha, of thy power יְֽכַחֲשׁ֖וּ <WH3584> ye-cha-cha-Shu submit לְךָ֣ le-Cha אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha. shall thine enemies

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הָאָ֤רֶץ׀ <WH776> ha-'A-retz All the earth יִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <WH7812> yish-ta-cha-Vu shall worship לְ֭ךָ Le-cha וִֽיזַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> vi-zam-me-ru- thee and shall sing לָ֑ךְ Lach; יְזַמְּר֖וּ <WH2167> ye-zam-me-Ru unto thee they shall sing שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha [to] thy name סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> le-Chu Come וּ֭רְאוּ <WH7200> U-re-'u and see מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <WH4659> mif-'a-Lot the works אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; of God נוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> no-Ra [he is] terrible עֲ֝לִילָ֗ה <WH5949> 'a-li-Lah, [in his] doing עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- toward בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei toward the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. of men

הָ֤פַךְ <WH2015> Ha-fach He turned יָ֨ם׀ <WH3220> yam the sea לְֽיַבָּשָׁ֗ה <WH3004> le-yab-ba-Shah, into dry בַּ֭נָּהָר <WH5104> Ban-na-hor through the flood יַֽעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> ya-'av-Ru [land] they went בְרָ֑גֶל <WH7272> ve-Ra-gel; on foot שָׁ֝֗ם <WH8033> m There נִשְׂמְחָה־ <WH8055> nis-me-chah- there did we rejoice בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

מֹ֘שֵׁ֤ל <WH4910> mo-Shel He ruleth בִּגְבוּרָת֨וֹ׀ <WH1369> big-vu-ra-To by his power עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> o-Lam, for ever עֵ֭ינָיו <WH5869> 'Ei-nav his eyes בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim the nations תִּצְפֶּ֑ינָה <WH6822> titz-Pei-nah; behold הַסּוֹרְרִ֓ים׀ <WH5637> has-sor-Rim let not the rebellious אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay; יָרִימוּ ya-ri-mu כיָר֖וּמוּ <WH7311> ya-Ru-mu bring up קלָ֣מוֹ la-mo סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. themselves Selah

בָּרְכ֖וּ <WH1288> ba-re-Chu O bless עַמִּ֥ים׀ <WH5971> 'am-Mim ye people אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God וְ֝הַשְׁמִ֗יעוּ <WH8085> ve-hash-Mi-'u, to be heard ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol and make the voice תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH8416> te-hil-la-To. of his praise

הַשָּׂ֣ם <WH7760> has-Sam Which holdeth נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ <WH5315> Naf-she-nu our soul בַּֽחַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> ba-chai-Yim; in life וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and does not נָתַ֖ן <WH5414> na-Tan and suffereth לַמּ֣וֹט <WH4132> lam-Mot to be moved רַגְלֵֽנוּ׃ <WH7272> rag-Le-nu. not our feet

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for בְחַנְתָּ֥נוּ <WH974> ve-chan-Ta-nu hast proved אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; For thou O God צְ֝רַפְתָּ֗נוּ <WH6884> tze-raf-Ta-nu, us thou hast tried כִּצְרָף־ <WH6884> kitz-rof- is tried כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. us as silver

הֲבֵאתָ֥נוּ <WH935> ha-ve-Ta-nu Thou broughtest בַמְּצוּדָ֑ה <WH4686> vam-me-tzu-Dah; us into the net שַׂ֖מְתָּ <WH7760> Sam-ta thou laidst מוּעָקָ֣ה <WH4157> mu-'a-Kah affliction בְמָתְנֵֽינוּ׃ <WH4975> ve-ma-te-Nei-nu. upon our loins

הִרְכַּ֥בְתָּ <WH7392> hir-Kav-ta to ride אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh, Thou hast caused men לְרֹ֫אשֵׁ֥נוּ <WH7218> le-Ro-She-nu over our heads בָּֽאנוּ־ <WH935> ba-nu- we went בָאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> va-'Esh through fire וּבַמַּ֑יִם <WH4325> u-vam-Ma-yim; and through water וַ֝תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נוּ <WH3318> vat-to-tzi-'E-nu, but thou broughtest us out לָֽרְוָיָֽה׃ <WH7310> La-re-va-Yah. into a wealthy

אָב֣וֹא <WH935> a-Vo I will go בֵיתְךָ֣ <WH1004> vei-te-Cha into thy house בְעוֹל֑וֹת <WH5930> ve-'o-Lot; with burnt offerings אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> 'a-shal-Lem I will pay לְךָ֣ le-Cha נְדָרָֽי׃ <WH5088> ne-da-Rai. thee my vows

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- Which פָּצ֥וּ <WH6475> pa-Tzu have uttered שְׂפָתָ֑י <WH8193> se-fa-Tai; Which my lips וְדִבֶּר־ <WH1696> ve-dib-ber- hath spoken פִּ֝֗י <WH6310> Pi, and my mouth בַּצַּר־ <WH6862> batz-tzar- when I was in trouble לִֽי׃ Li.

עֹ֘ל֤וֹת <WH5930> o-Lot unto thee burnt sacrifices מֵחִ֣ים <WH4220> me-Chim of fatlings אַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> 'a-'a-leh- I will offer לָּ֭ךְ lach עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- With קְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> ke-To-ret with the incense אֵילִ֑ים <WH352> 'ei-Lim; of rams אֶ֥עֱשֶֽׂה <WH6213> 'E-'e-seh I will offer בָקָ֖ר <WH1241> va-Kar bullocks עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with עַתּוּדִ֣ים <WH6260> 'at-tu-Dim with goats סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

לְכֽוּ־ <WH1980> le-chu- Come שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> shim-'U [and] hear וַ֭אֲסַפְּרָה <WH5608> Va-'a-sap-pe-rah and I will declare כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> yir-'Ei all ye that fear אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; God אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher of what עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah what he hath done לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> le-naf-Shi. for my soul

אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him פִּֽי־ <WH6310> pi- unto him with my mouth קָרָ֑אתִי <WH7121> ka-Ra-ti; I cried וְ֝רוֹמַ֗ם <WH7318> ve-ro-Mam, be extolled תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat with לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃ <WH3956> le-sho-Ni. my tongue

אָ֭וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven iniquity אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti If I regard בְלִבִּ֑י <WH3820> ve-lib-Bi; in my heart לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo will not יִשְׁמַ֣ע׀ <WH8085> yish-Ma' will not hear אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai. the Lord

אָ֭כֵן <WH403> 'A-chen [But] verily שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> sha-Ma' hath heard אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; God הִ֝קְשִׁ֗יב <WH7181> hik-Shiv, [me] he hath attended בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol to the voice תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti. of my prayer

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; [be] God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor הֵסִ֘יר <WH5493> he-Sir which hath not turned away תְּפִלָּתִ֥י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti my prayer וְ֝חַסְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> ve-chas-Do, nor his mercy מֵאִתִּֽי׃ <WH854> me-'it-Ti. chief
